# rtx_interface_acl (Resource)

Manages ACL bindings to an interface on RTX routers. This resource applies access control lists (ACLs) to interfaces for traffic filtering.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `interface` (String) Interface name (lan1, lan2, pp1, tunnel1, etc.)

### Optional

- `dynamic_filters_in` (List of Number) Inbound dynamic filter numbers (for stateful inspection)
- `dynamic_filters_out` (List of Number) Outbound dynamic filter numbers (for stateful inspection)
- `ip_access_group_in` (String) Inbound IPv4 access list name
- `ip_access_group_out` (String) Outbound IPv4 access list name
- `ipv6_access_group_in` (String) Inbound IPv6 access list name
- `ipv6_access_group_out` (String) Outbound IPv6 access list name
- `ipv6_dynamic_filters_in` (List of Number) Inbound IPv6 dynamic filter numbers
- `ipv6_dynamic_filters_out` (List of Number) Outbound IPv6 dynamic filter numbers

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
